replies.body:
Calling all Oceanic content creators! http://i.imgur.com/qICugDe.png

Hey guys, we are looking to shine some light on the talent in our community.

We are wanting to bring some attention the League-related cosplayers, YouTubers, Twitch streamers, and artists among us.

Do you want to be a part of this? To showcase your content, help each other grow, or just be a part of some cool community collaborations, then reply to this post!

Just simply add your own comment on one of the four comment threads below that sounds like you.

Please include the following info so we can learn a bit more about you:

  • Specify your area of expertise/interest within your chosen discipline (eg. if you pick artist, what kind of artist? digital/3-D/ paintings/etc)
  • What do you want from an initiative such as this?
  • What type of collaborations would you be up for (if any)?
  • Social media links? (We want to show your craft to the world :) )

Our first step on this project will be to create some pinned posts with a list of everyone's summoner name and links to their social medias (depending on whatâ€™s appropriate). Each content discipline will have a separate post, and your name can only be on one list so choose the one you most identify with.
